phrases.body: People, who know “how?”, will always work for people, who know “why?”.

phrases.author: Laziz Adkhamov
phrases.body: I never aspired to earn money, I had the desire to make something cool.

phrases.author: Laziz Adkhamov
phrases.body: I don’t have targets for one year. My goals are for 5-10 years.

phrases.author: Laziz Adkhamov
phrases.body: You start a company, pay salaries, taxes, fines, and maybe something is left for you at the end. That is the burden, all entrepreneurs carry on their shoulders throughout their lives.

phrases.author: Laziz Adkhamov
phrases.body: A normal human wants stability. Enrepreneur is not a normal human being, some kind of mutant.

phrases.author: Laziz Adkhamov
phrases.body: When you truly want something, think about it all the time, the Galaxy thinks: “Okay, okay, you want it, take it, go ahead.

phrases.author: Laziz Adkhamov
phrases.body: Characteristics of a team: set up a common goal, gather, execute, break up. Shared values is what unites them.

phrases.author: Laziz Adkhamov
phrases.body: Everything you are using is created by entrepreneurs. They didn’t like how it was before, for instance, chairs, and were constantly improving them and other things around, so that now you can seat on comfortable one.

phrases.author: Laziz Adkhamov
phrases.body: Professionals know “how” to do things. They study many years to learn this. Entrepreneur doesn’t know “how”. He build a chain, where many people, who know “how”, generate added value.

phrases.author: web
phrases.body: To buy lego and to build a car from it are two different dimensions.

phrases.author: Laziz Adkhamov
phrases.body: If you die today while sleeping, the last thing you saw would be your mobile phone. Waking up in the morning, the first thing you see is also your gadget.

phrases.author: Laziz Adkhamov
phrases.body: Entrepreneurs never have any profit. When they finally get it, they reinvest it somewhere else. So, they may have a lot of stuff, but no cash on hands.

phrases.author: Laziz Adkhamov
phrases.body: The main difference between an entrepreneur and employed person is the planning horizon. Managers usually plan only for 1 year ahead, while entrepreneurs build at least 5-10 years vision.

phrases.author: Laziz Adkhamov
phrases.body: Previously you would be a good father, who cooks well. Today, the digital world allows you to be an accountant in the daytime, an uber driver after your work, online german learner in the morning, and have a youtube blog on Saturday about cooking and monetize your talents.
